TopicTitle: Not all pods store EVA experiments?

Articles.Content:
The MkI Lander Can (the little one) won't allow me to store the EVA experiments.

But the cfg file has the required module definitions...

EDIT: Seems it's a lack of power issue... but the first time i encountered it i had solars all over the ship in plain daylight...

Edited October 23, 2013 by Mokmo
